Home

Welcome to Explosive Chess, this is a chess variant that lets you choose between normal capture or exploding when attacking.

Choose playing either against the computer or a player on the navigation bar.

Bravery is rewarded in this game, if the king explodes himself in a way that reaches the other, he wins.
